players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Given the recent events and my findings, I believe we should focus on Diana as our primary suspect. She is the only one who could have potentially killed Bob."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie's assessment. Let's keep a close eye on Diana."
Diana: "I have nothing to hide. I was in my house the entire night and did not leave until morning. Let's focus on finding the real killer instead of pointing fingers at each other."
You: "Let's not jump to conclusions. We need more information before we can make any accusations."
